subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dwayne Wade blocked two shots in the final 22 seconds and Udonis Haslem scored 6 points in the final 6.3 as the Miami Heat rallied for a 101-96 victory against the Detroit Pistons.
snippet: Dwayne Wade blocked two shots in the final 22 seconds and Udonis Haslem scored 6 points in the final 6.3 as the Miami Heat rallied for a 101-96 victory against the Detroit Pistons.
